short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience a starry night scene on your new tab with a minimalist to-do list, bookmarks, multiple search engines, and clock.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upgrade your new tab page with a tranquil night sky ambiance, offering a refreshing departure from the cluttered default. Crafted with care, this extension priorities simplicity, enabling a peaceful and organised browsing journey. Embrace a minimalistic experience that's free from distractions, resembling a serene canvas rather than an ad-laden new tab page, while also featuring a simple to-do list, bookmarks and a clock for added productivity.
